name: Spear Cop
description:
This is a short game where you play as Spear Cop. He throws spears.

You're set out on a task to retrieve the stolen blockchain, to do so you must capture all 9 thieves.

This was my first game jam and my first uploaded game. I'm setting out to make one game per month this summer, this is 1/3.

Controls:

W - Forward

A - Left

S - Backward

D - Right

Mouse 1 - Shoot
